John H. and Catharine R. Ryerson deed to Absalom L. Anderson
Ryerson, John H., active 1867.
AHMC — Ryerson, John H.
1 item(s) in 1 folder.
1867 October 18 Indenture transferring a parcel of land in Manhattan from John H. Ryerson and his wife, Catharine R. Ryerson, to Absalom L. Anderson. For further details about this item, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.
